name: PSYCHOPATH
description:
PSYCHOPATH is a horror puzzle game where you got kidnapped by an entity, you have to solve a few riddles to escape from the place, or what happens next is decided by your own actions, because this game has multiple endings!

This is a game from the TRIALITY | Horror Games Collection, more games are available at https://triality-games.itch.io/triality-horror-games

The game PSYCHOPATH was made by GREGORIUS KISSING

Insta: https://www.instagram.com/gregorius_kissing/?hl=de

Twitter: https://twitter.com/_Kissing_
